Function# IORecursiveLockWakeup

macOS 10.0+

```
void IORecursiveLockWakeup(IORecursiveLock *_lock, void *event, bool oneThread);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/1553014-iorecursivelockwakeup#see-also)

### [Recursive Locks](/documentation/kernel/1553014-iorecursivelockwakeup#recursive-locks)

[`IORecursiveLockAlloc`](/documentation/kernel/1553013-iorecursivelockalloc)Allocates and initializes an recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockFree`](/documentation/kernel/1553031-iorecursivelockfree)Frees a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockGetMachLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552988-iorecursivelockgetmachlock)Accessor to a Mach mutex.[`IORecursiveLockHaveLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552995-iorecursivelockhavelock)Check if a recursive lock is held by the calling thread.[`IORecursiveLockLock`](/documentation/kernel/1553020-iorecursivelocklock)Lock a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockSleep`](/documentation/kernel/1553001-iorecursivelocksleep)[`IORecursiveLockSleepDeadline`](/documentation/kernel/1552986-iorecursivelocksleepdeadline)[`IORecursiveLockTryLock`](/documentation/kernel/1552993-iorecursivelocktrylock)Attempt to lock a recursive lock.[`IORecursiveLockUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1553032-iorecursivelockunlock)Unlock a recursive lock.
